>>130755309

>Enable VBO in user preference->System
>Press N, -> Shading, Enable GLSL
>Same N window, -> Display, Disable "Outline Selected"
>Turn off "Double Sided" in Object Data
>Don't pull Subdivision or Multires to the bottom of your Modifier Stack
>Use Solid mode in Viewport Shading

Of course it is not Zbrush, but you can manage if you know what you are doing.
